SoftwareType.Name: Téléphone portable
SoftwareType.Description: Make a Téléphone portable to sell to the masses!

Category.Name: Défaut
Category.Description: A Téléphone portable. What more could you want.

Feature.Name: Boîtier de téléphone portable
Feature.Description: Well, what else are you going to put the parts in?!

Feature.Name: Boîtier de téléphone portable avec appareil photo
Feature.Description: Allows you to add in a camera.

Feature.Name: Amplificateur d'enceinte
Feature.Description: You'll need these for sound. Isn't it obvious? No? Ok.

Feature.Name: Enceinte
Feature.Description: Would make sense to have these with the amp? No? It's your Téléphone portable not mine...

Feature.Name: Enceintes stéréo
Feature.Description: Two Enceintes are better than one. (in theory)

Feature.Name: Jack 3.5mm
Feature.Description: For listening to music through headTéléphone portables (not included)

Feature.Name: 3.5mm Combi-Jack
Feature.Description: Plug headTéléphone portables and a microTéléphone portable into the same port, at the same time!

Feature.Name: MicroTéléphone portable
Feature.Description: For making calls, you know, the point of a Téléphone portable? Oh forget it.

Feature.Name: Affichage monochrome
Feature.Description: A basic monochrome screen, two colours, low resolution.

Feature.Name: Affichage LCD TFT
Feature.Description: Yay for colours, its a shame theres about 2 degrees of viewing angles!

Feature.Name: Affichage tactile LCD TFT
Feature.Description: No advancement in the same awful display, but you can poke it now!

Feature.Name: Affichage tactile IPS
Feature.Description: Touchscreen and a display that isn't absoultely dreadful. Madness.

Feature.Name: ARM SOC
Feature.Description: The brains of the Téléphone portable. The thing that does it all. 42.
